deploy.startCommand: python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py migrate --settings=asliddin_education.settings_production && python manage.py create_superuser --settings=asliddin_education.settings_production && python manage.py populate_data --settings=asliddin_education.settings_production && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:$PORT --settings=asliddin_education.settings_production
